com.btc.redg.runtime.transformer

Interface PreparedStatementParameterSetter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPreparedStatementParameterSetter
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface PreparedStatementParameterSetter
    Interface used to transform java objects before adding them to the prepared statement. Should be used to "reverse" custom data type mapping.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setParameter(PreparedStatement statement, int parameterIndex, Object object, AttributeMetaInfo attributeMetaInfo, Connection connection)
      Use this method to customize how RedG sets parameters on a prepared statement.

    • Method Detail

      • setParameter

        void setParameter(PreparedStatement statement,
                  int parameterIndex,
                  Object object,
                  AttributeMetaInfo attributeMetaInfo,
                  Connection connection)
           throws SQLException
        Use this method to customize how RedG sets parameters on a prepared statement. The information about the attribute/column is stored in attributeMetaInfo.
        Parameters:
        statement - The statement to set the parameter on
        parameterIndex - The parameter index
        object - The object to transform
        attributeMetaInfo - Meta information about the attribute
        connection - The JDBC connection. Can be used to create objects like Clob or Blob
        Throws:
        SQLException - Gets thrown if some SQL error occurred
